venue.name: Boston University College of Fine Arts

item.description:
Over the river and thru the woods to Boston University we return yet again for a third week of improv inzanity!!

Bring yourself, bring your smile, bring your laughter, bring a friend, and get ready to FREAKOUT!!!

***Please be aware of the room switch though as we are packing on up to Room 410. I'm sure we'll have signs or lovely greeting people to guide you the way.

This week Doug will be heading up the show and afterward we can go 1 block down Comm Ave for snacks at the Sunset Cantina.

This area also has a plentiful on-street parking!

If you have any questions about getting there, just email Lisa

Rock on!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be foaming at the mouth with improv..... IN ROOM 410!!
item.name: Incubate across the River - Improv at BU Part III... *note the different room!
